WorkItem.Description:
I've been using Rawr b14.1 and have noticed that there is a 3% spell crit error in the data displayed on the Stats tab for mages. It almost looks like the Molten Armor buff is being applied by default.
 
I've verified the other tabs to ensure all options are disabled, and the extra 3% spell crit still appears.  Enabling the options under buffs displays the correct increase. Automatic Armor (under Options tab) is enabled by default, disabling it has no visible changes other than on comparisons chart. 
 
As a reference, I simply imported my profile from the Armory. I also tried with 3 other mages with same results.

Comments.Message: If you're arcane what you're seeing is probably Arcane Potency.
